00039 double Platform::GetSystemTime()
00040 {
00041     static LARGE_INTEGER Frequency;
00042     static BOOL          UseHighPerformanceTimer = QueryPerformanceFrequency(&Frequency);
00043 
00044     if (UseHighPerformanceTimer)
00045     {
00046         // High performance counter available : use it
00047         LARGE_INTEGER CurrentTime;
00048         QueryPerformanceCounter(&CurrentTime);
00049 
00050         return static_cast<double>(CurrentTime.QuadPart) / Frequency.QuadPart;
00051     }
00052     else
00053     {
00054         // High performance counter not available : use GetTickCount (less accurate)
00055         return GetTickCount() * 0.001;
00056     }
00057 }
